text: Patrick Jaillet is a French-American electrical engineer and computer scientist who as of 2017 was the Dugald C. Jackson Professor at Massachusetts Institute of Technology. His research interests are online and data-focused optimization as shown by his commonly cited research papers, of which was highest cited in 2016. He was elected to the 2013 class of Fellows of the Institute for Operations Research and the Management Sciences. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology faculty Category:American electrical engineers Category:American computer scientists Category:Fellows of the Institute for Operations Research and the Management Sciences
title: Patrick Jaillet
